lg.Sometimes, when we are upset, we talk to: Ebiseera ebimu bwe tubeera nga tukyankalanye, twogera n'abantu abalala ku bizibu byaffe okufuna amagezi n'obuyambi.
lg.But other times it is helpful to listen: Naye mu biseera ebirala kiyamba nnyo okuwuliriza n'okuyamba abalala. Bwe tuteeka amaanyi gaffe ku kulowooza ku kirala, kiyamba bwongo bwaffe okutereera.
lg.To do this, one makes an effort to give: Okukola kino, omuntu omu afuba okuwa okusinga okutwala, awuliriza okusinga okwogera, awa endowooza ennungi okusinga embi, aleeta essanyu okusinga okwemulugunya.
lg.It is an exercise that can impact our ow: Bikolwa byaffe bye bisobola okukyusa embeera zaffe awamu n'ezabo abatwetoolodde.
lg.Manage Your Triggers: Kola ku bintu byo ebireeta embeera ekunakuwaza
lg.Learning your triggers and avoiding them: Okumanya ebintu ebireeta embeera yo n'okubyewala kiyinza okwetaaga obugumiikiriza, okwefumiitiriza ku by'olowooza okusobola okuzuula n'okuyiga engeri z'okubyewala n'okubikolako. Ebimu ku bireeta embeera eno mulimu;
lg.In order to reduce the likelihood of hav: Mu kaweefube w'okukendeeza okubeera n'embeera ey'okwesika olw'embeera zino oba ebituukawo ebirala, kya mugaso okukola kyonna ky'osobola okwegobako ebireeta embeera y'okwesika ng'ogoberera ebisikiriza. Obubagulizo obumu bw'oyinza okukozesa
lg.Consider doing the service act without o: Faayo okukola obuweereza ebiseera ebimu ng'abantu abalala tebamanyi
lg.Doing acts of service which can be descr: Okukola ekikolwa ky'obuweereza ekisobola okunnyonnyolwa ng'okukolera omuntu ekintu ky'omanyi kye bayinza okwagala ekisobola okubaleetako embeera ennungi wamu n'okubeera obulungi.
lg.Pick one service goal to complete in the: Londa ekiruubirirwa ky'obuweereza kimu eky'okumaliriza mu nnaku ntono eziddako. Okuyamba omuntu oba ekibinja kisobola okuganyula mu kubeera kwo obulungi.
lg.Carry groceries for an elder or mother w: Situlirako omukadde ebintu eby'okukozesa awaka oba maama ayina abaana abato
lg.Volunteer at your church/mosque: Kola emirimu gy'obwannakyewa ku kkanisa /omuzikiti gwo
lg.Help someone with their school or home t: Yambako omuntu n'emirimu gy'oku ssomero oba egy'awaka
lg.Wash up the plates and cups after a meal: Yoza amasowaani n'ebikopo oluvannyuma lw'okulya emmere nga togambiddwa
lg.Wash/iron your parents or siblings’ clot: Yoza/golola engoye z'abazadde bo oba baganda bo
lg.Empty the dustbin into the designated wa: Yiwayo kasasiro mu bifo ebiyiirwamu kasasiro okuva mu kintu mw'akungaanyizibwa
lg.Making friends or getting to know other: Okukola emikwano oba okumanya abantu abalala kya mugaso nnyo mu kubeera obulungi. Ebiseera ebimu kizibu okukola enkwatagana zino olw'ensonga nti olina ensonyi, tetumanyi balala  oba tutya  okutwesonyiwa, okutuyisa obubi oba okutusekerera.
lg.Try to build your social community in sm: Gezaako okuzimba enkolaganayo n'abantu mu mitendera emitonotono mu kiseera ekimu. Londa ekiruubirirwa kimu eky'okukolaganira awamu n'okugezaako okukola emirimu egyenyigiramu abantu abangi mu nnaku entono eziddako.
lg.Spend time with a special family member,: Malako obudde ne bammemba ba famire yo ab'omuwendo, omukwano, gw'osoma naye, oba omuntu okuva ku kkanisa/omuzikiti oba okuva mu kibinja ky'abantu b'osaba nabo. Ebiseera ebimu osobola okusisinkana abantu okuva mu bibiina by'abalwadde b'ensimbu, ng'okuyita mu bibiina by'abalwadde b'ensimbu mu Uganda oba aba Purple bench.
lg.Positive affirmations are positive state: Ebikolwa ebirungi ze ngeri ennungi ze weeyogerako okusobola okukuyamba okujjukira ebirabo byo, obukugu, n'emikisa. Londa ebintu 3 ebyokwogera ku buli kumakya n'ekiro okumala ennaku  3
lg.This is a very easy and fun way to chang: Eno y'engeri ennyangu ennyo okukyusa ekifaananyi kyo! Singa obeera n'obuzibu olina obuzibu mu kulowooza ku birowoozo ebirungi ku ggwe, buuza ebintu.
lg.Tallies updated every after 3 days: Emiwendo giddizibwa obuggya buli luvannyuma lwa nnaku 3

lg.The sensation of being in a familiar pla: Empulira y'okubeera mu kifo ky'omanyi oba okuyita mu mbeera efaananira ddala eyo.
lg.An experience of being unfamiliar with a: Embeera y'okubeera nga tojjukira muntu oba ekifo oba embeera mu butuufu gye wali omanyi obulungi ennyo.
lg.Tingling Sensation: Embeera y'obusimu bw'omu mubiri okusindika obubaka obusukka ku bwa bulijjo.
lg.ACE Uganda built the EPILEPSY SMART app: ACE Uganda yazimba apu y'obulwadde bw'ensimbu eya EPILEPSY SMART nga yabwereere. Obuweereza buno buweebwa aba ACE Uganda nga bwa bwereere era bugendereddwamu kukozesebwa nga bwe buli
lg.This page is used to inform visitors reg: Omuko guno gukozesebwa okutegeeza abagenyi ku bikwata ku nkola zange omuli okukuŋŋaanya, okukozesa n'okwasanguza obubaka bw'omuntu ssekinnoomu singa omuntu yenna aba asazeewo okukozesa obuweereza bwange
lg.If you choose to use our Service, then y: Bw'olondawo okukozesa obuweereza bwaffe, awo oba okkirizza okukuŋŋaanya n'okukozesa obubaka mu kwekuusa ku nkola eno. Obubaka bw’omuntu ssekinnoomu bwe tukuŋŋaanya bukozesebwa okuwa n'okulongoosa obuweereza. Tetujja kukozesa oba okugabana obubaka bwo na muntu yenna okuggyako nga bwe kirambuluddwa mu nkola eno ey’okwekisiza
lg.The terms used in this Privacy Policy ha: Enkola ekozeseddwa mu nkola y’okwekisiza eyina amakulu ge gamu nga mu nkola n’obukwakkulizo bwaffe, obufunibwa mu apu ya EPILEPSY SMART okugyako nga era ennyonnyoddwa mu nkola y’okwekisiza
lg.For a better experience, while using our: Okusobola okwetaaya obulungi ng’okozesa obuweereza bwaffe, tuyinza okukwetaaga okutuwa obubaka obwa ssekinnoomu obukwawula, omuli newankubadde si bwokka erinnya, mmeyiro, ennamba y’essimu. Obubaka bwe tukusaba bujja kukumiibwa ku kyuma kyo era nga tetujja ku bukuŋŋaanya mu ngeri emu oba endala.
lg.The app does use third-party services th: Apu ekozesa obuweereza bwa kkampuni endala eziteenyigiramu butereevu ezirangirira enkola n’obukwakkulizo
lg.We want to inform you that whenever you: Twagala okukutegeeza nti buli lw’okozesa obuweereza bwaffe, mu mbeera ey’ensobi mu apu tukuŋŋaanya obubaka n’amawulire (okuyita mu buweereza bwa kkampuni ezitenyigiramu butereevu) ku ssimu yo obuyitibwa obubaka obuyingize. Obubaka buno obuyingiziddwa buyinza okuzingiramu amawulire nga agakwata ku ndagiriro y’essimu yo ng’eyungiddwa ku mutimbagano, erinnya ly’essimu, obuweereza bw’essimu bw’ekozesa, okuteekako apu ng’okozesa obuweereza bwange, ssaawa n’ennaku z’omwezi lw’okozesezza obuweereza n’ebipimo ebirala
lg.Cookies: Obutundutundu obutonotono obw’obubaka obuterekeddwa ebibanja by’emitimbagano ku kompyuta.
lg.Cookies are files with a small amount of: Obubaka bw’ebibinja by’emitimbagano obuterekebwa ku kompyuta ziba ffayiro eziyina omuwendo gw’obubaka obutono obutera okukozesebwa n’ebitendo eby’enjawulo ebibwawula. Buno busindikibwa ku muyungo gwo ogw’omutimbagano okuva ku bibanja by’emitimbagano by’okyalira era ne buterekebwa ku mutwe gw’ekyuma kyokozesa
lg.This Service does not use these “cookies: Obuweereza buno tebukozesa nkola ya “kutereka bubaka kuva ku mitimbagano” butereevu. Newankubadde, apu esobola okukozesa kkoodi z’obuweereza bwa kkampuni eziteenyigiramu butereevu ezikozesa enkola y’okutereka obubaka okuva ku mitimbagano” okukuŋŋaanya obubaka n’okulongoosa obuweereza bwabwe. Oyina okusalawo oba okkiriza oba ogaana “obubaka buno obuterekebwa ku ssimu okuva ku mutimbagano” era omanye na di obubaka buno obuterekebwa ku kyuma kyo lwe busindikibwa. Bw’osalawo okugaana obubaka bwaffe obuva ku mutimbagano, oyinza obutasobola kukozesa ebitundu ebimu eby’obuweereza.
lg.We may employ third-party companies and: Tuyinza okukozesa obuweereza obwa kkampuni eziteenyigira butereevu mu buweereza buno n’abantu ssekinnoomu olw’ensonga zino wammanga
lg.To assist us in analyzing how our Servic: Okutuyamba mu kwekenneenya engeri obuweereza bwaffe gye bukozesebwamu
lg.We want to inform users of this Service: Twagala okutegeeza abakozesa b’obuweereza buno nti obuweereza bwa kkampuni eziteenyigiramu butereevu buyina obusobozi okutuuka ku mawulire agabakwatako ssekinnoomu. Ensonga yakukola mulimu ogubaweereddwa ku lwaffe. Newankubadde basabibwa obutayasanguza oba okukozesa obubaka mu nsonga endala yonna
lg.We value your trust in providing us your: Tussa ekitiibwa mu kutuwa obubaka obukukwatako, na bwekityo tusindiikiriza okukozesa engeri z’okukuumamu obubaka ez’okusasulira. Naye jjukira nti tewali ngeri ya kusaasaana ku mitimbagano, oba engeri y’okutereka obubaka ku byuma bikalimagezi.eri ebitundu 100% obutaba na bulabe n’okwesigika, era tetusobola kukakasa bukuumi bwayo obujjuvu.
lg.This Service may contain links to other: Empeereza eno eyinza okubaamu obutindo obukutwala ku bibanja ebirala. Bw’onyiga ku katindo k’obuweereza bwa kkampuni eteenyigiramu butereevu, ojja kusindikibwa ku kibanja. Weetegereze nti ebibanja bino eby’ebweru tebiddukanyizibwa ffe. N’olw’ensonga eyo, tukkubiriza okwekaliriza enkola y’enkiso ey’ebibanja bino, Tetuyina buyinza era na buvunaanyizibwa ku biteekebwako, enkola ez’enkiso, oba ebikolebwako ku bibanja by’emitimbagano oba obuweereza obwa kkampuni ezitenyigiramu butereevu.
lg.These Services do not address anyone und: Obuweereza buno tebukubirizibwa muntu yenna wansi w’emyaka 13. Tetuggyako bubaka bukwata ku muntu ssekinnoomu nga tumanyi okuva ku baana abali wansi w’emyaka 13. Singa mu mbeera nga tuzudde nti omwana wansi w’emyaka 13 ampadde obubaka obumukwatako, mu bwangu ddala tubusiimula okuva ku mpeereza zaffe. Bw’oba oli muzadde oba omulabirizi era ng’omanyi nti omwana wo atuwadde obubaka obumukwatako, tutegeeze tusobole okukola ekyetaagisa.
lg.Changes to this Privacy Policy: Enkyukyakyuka mu nkola ya twekisize eno.
lg.The owners of this application may updat: Bannannyini apu eno bayinza okuzza obuggya enkola yaffe eya twekisize ekiseera kyonna. Na bwe kityo okubirizibwa okwekaliriza omuko guno buli kiseera okulaba enkyukakyuka yonna. Tujja kukutegeeza ku nkyukakyuka yonna nga tuteeka enkola ya twekisize empya ku mukutu guno
lg.If you have any questions or suggestions: Bw’oba oyina ekibuuzo kyonna oba ekiteeso ku nkola ya twekisize eno, tolemererwa ku tutuukirira ku
lg.Something went wrong, please try again: Waliwo ekitagenze bulungi, ddamu ogezeeko edda
lg.Name: Erinnya
lg.Updating you information will log you ou: Okuzza obuggya obubaka bwo kijja kukufulumya ku mukutu butereevu
lg.By downloading or using the app, these t: Bw’owanula oba bw’okozesa apu, ebiragiro bino bijja kukolako butereevu –osaanye okukakasa nti obisoma n’obwegendereza nga tonnakozesa apu. Tokkirizibwa ku kkopa, oba okutereeza apu, ekitundu kyonna ekya apu, oba akabonero kaffe mu ngeri yonna. Tokkirizibwa kugezaako kusimbuliza kkoodi y’ensibuko ya apu, era tosaanye kugezaako kuvvunula apu eno mu nnimi endala, oba okukolamu ebika ebirala. Apu yennyini, n’obubonero obulala bwonna.
lg.ACE Uganda is committed to ensuring that: ACE Uganda yeewaddeyo okulaba nti apu ebeera ya mugaso era nga nnungi bwe kisoboka. N’ow’ensonga eyo, twesigaliza obuyinza okukola enkyukakyuka ku apu oba okusasuza obuweereza bwayo, mu budde bwonna era ku lw’ensonga yonna. Tetujja kukusasuza olwa apu oba obuweereza bwayo nga tetukutegeezezza bulungi ddala ki ky’osasulira
lg.The EPILEPSY SMART app stores and proces: Apu ya EPILEPSY SMART etereka era n’ekola ku bubaka obukwata ku muntu bw’otuwadde, okusobola okuwa obuweereza bwayo. Buvunaanyizibwa bwo okukuuma essimu yo era n’okukozesa apu mu ngeri ey’obuvunaanyizibwa. Noolwekyo tukkubiriza oleme kuggywawo bukwakkulizo bwateekebwa ku ssimu yo abo abaagikola oba okuyingira munda mu nsibuko y’obuweereza bw’essimu okugikozesa by’oyagala, era y’enkola y’okuggyamu obukwakkulizo obutambuza essimu n’ebigaanibwa ebyateekebwawo enkola entongole essimu yo kwetambulira. Kiyinza okunafuya essimu yo okufuna obulabe mu nkola egitambuza/ebiwuka/pulogulaamu ez’obulabe ezinatta obukuumi bw’essimu yo era kiyinza okutegeeza nti apu ya EPILEPSY SMART tejja kukola bulungi oba tejja kukolera ddala
lg.You should be aware that there are certa: Osaanye omanye nti waliwo ebintu ebimu ACE Uganda byetagenda kuvunaanyizibwako. Enkola ezimu eza apu zijja kwetaagisa apu okuba ng’eyungiddwa ku yintanenti. Okuyungibwa kuno kusobola okuba okwa Wi-fi oba nga kwa mukutu gwa mpeereza yo, naye ACE Uganda tesobola kutwala buvunaanyizibwa ku butakola bwa apu mu bujjuvu singa oba toyina w’oggya Wi-fi era nga toyina yintanenti egabibwa mukutu gwo ogwempuliziganya
lg.If you’re using the app outside of an ar: Singa obeera okozesa apu mu kifo ewatatuuka Wi-fi, osaanye okujjukira nti enkola z’endagaano n’omukutu gwo ogw’essimu zijja kugobererwa. Ekinaavaamu, oyinza okusasuzibwa omukutu gwo ogw’empuliziganya olw’omuwendo gw’obusaaganda mu kaseera k’onoomala ng’oyungiddwa ku apu, oba okusasuzibwa olw’obuweereza bwa kkampuni eziteenyigira butereevu mu kukozesa empeereza. Mu kukozesa apu, okkiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obw’okusasula okwengeri yonna, omuli n’okusasuzibwa ng’okozesezza yintaneti wabweru w’ekitundu kyo (kwe gamba ekitundu oba eggwanga) nga toggyeko yintanenti nga toli mu ggwanga lyo. Bw’oba si gwe asasula ebisale by’ekyuma ky’okozesa okufuna apu, bambi manya nti ffe tuteebereza nti ofunye olukusa okuva eri asasula ebisale by’okukozesa apu.
lg.Along the same lines, ACE Uganda cannot: Mu buufu bwe bumu, ACE Uganda tejja kutwalanga buvunaanyizibwa olw’engeri gy’okozesaamu apu kwe gamba. Oyina okukakasa nti ekyuma ky’okozesa kisigala nga kiyino omuliro Bwe kiggwako omuliro nga tosobola kukiteekako okufuna obuweereza, ACE Uganda tejja kutwala buvunaanyizibwa.
lg.With respect to ACE Uganda’s responsibil: Mu kussa ekitiibwa mu buvunaanyizibwa bwa ACE Uganda mu kukozesa kwo okwa apu, bw’oba okozesa apu, kirungi okukissa mu birowoozo nti newankubadde tofaayo okukakasa nti eddizibwa obuggya oba okuba entuufu ekiseera kyonna, twesigamu ku buweereza bwa kkampuni eziteenyigiramu butereevu okutuwa obubaka tusobole okububateerawo. ACE Uganda tekkiriza bbanja lyonna lya kufiirwa butereevu oba si mu butereevu, ofuna obumanyirivu oluvannyuma lw’okwesigamira ddala ku nkozesa ya apu mu bujjuvu.
lg.At some point, we may wish to update the: Mu kiseera ekimu, tuyinza okwagala okuzza obuggya apu. Apu mu kiseera kino kweri ku bakozesa Anduloyidi – ebyetaago by’enkola (era okwongerako enkola endala tusalawo okwongeza okubeerawo kwa apu) tuyinza okukyusa, era nga ojja kwetaaga okuwanulayo ebipya bw’oba Oyagala okusigala ng’okozesa apu. ACE Uganda tesuubiza nti ejja kubeera ng’ezza buggya apu esobole okubeera ey’omugaso gyoli ne/oba ekola n’ebika bya Anduloyidi gy’otadde ku kyuma kyo. Wabula, gwe suubiza okukkirizanga ebipya ebya apu bwe biba bikuweereddwa. Era tuyinza okwagala okulekera awo okubawa apu, era nga tuyinza okusazaamu enkozesa yaayo ekiseera kyonna nga tetuwadde kulabula kwa kusazaamu gy’oli. Okuggyako nga tukugambye, ku kusazaamu kwonna.
lg.the rights and licenses granted to you i: Eddembe ne layisinsi ebikuweereddwa mu nkola eno bijja kuggwawo
lg.you must stop using the app, and (if nee: Oteekeddwa okuymiriza okukozesa apu, era (bwe kiba kyetaagisa) gisiimuule okuva ku ssimu yo
lg.We may update our Terms and Conditions f: Tuyinza okuzza obuggya enkola n’obukwakkulizo ekiseera kyonna. Na bwekityo okubirizibwa okwekaliriza omuko guno buli kiseera okulaba enkyukakyuka zonna. Tujja kukutegeeza ku nkyukakyka zonna nga tukuteera enkola n’obukwakkulizo obupya ku muko guno.
lg.If you have any questions or suggestions: Bw’oba oyina ekibuuzo kyonna oba ebirowooza ku nkola n’obukwakkulizo bwaffe, togaana ku tutuukirira ku
lg.The race may be long but you are stronge: Emisinde giyinza okuba emiwanvu wabula oli mugumu okusinga bwe weewaana
lg.Compare yourself to who you were yesterd: Weegeraageranye ku bwe wabadde eggulo, si ku muntu mulala olwaleero
lg.So many people are afraid of failure, wh: Abantu bangi nnyo batya okulemererwa, ddi era ki kye balina okweraliikiria kwe kwejjusa
lg.The view is beautiful from the top, but: Gy'otunudde walabika bulungi ng'oli waggulu, wabula waliwo obulungi ng'olinnye waggulu. Tokibuusa maaso.
lg.Discipline will take you places where mo: Empisa zijja kukutwala mu bifo amaanyi we gatasobola.
lg.You get tested the most when you're abou: Ofuna okusoomoozebwa kungi bw'obeera ng'onaatera okutuuka ku mutendera omuggya, toggwamu maanyi.
lg.What we fear doing is usually what we ne: Kye tusinga okutya okukola kye tusinga okwetaaga okukola emirundi egiwera.
lg.If you cannot do great things, do small: Bw'oba tosobola kukola bintu bya nnaggwano, kola ebitono mu ngeri ey'amaanyi
lg.Life and nature show us you have to get: Obulamu n'embeera bitulaga nti olina okuyita mu mbeera enzibu okusobola okutuuka mu mbeera eyeeyagaza.
lg.Life doesn’t get better by chance it get: Obulamu tebukyuka na mukisa wabula na nkyukakyuka
lg.There is no right time, just time, and w: Tewali budde butuufu, budde bwonna na kiki ky'osobola okubukozesa
lg.The enemy wouldn’t be attacking you so h: Omulabe yandibadde takulumbagana nnyo singa tobaddeemu kintu kya muwendo. Ababbi tebabba mu bifulukwa
lg.Delayed does not mean denied it just mea: Okulwawo tekitegeeza kulemererwa wabula kitegeeza nti olina okulindamu kko akabanga akawanvuko n'okukola ennyo.
lg.Most people who are criticizing and judg: Abantu abasinga abakolokota n'okulamula by'okoze tebannaba na kukola ky'olemereddwa.
lg.Your direction is more important then yo: Ekiruubirirwa kyo kya mugaso nnyo okusinga emisinde gyo
lg.There's a version of yourself that you h: Waliwo ggwe omulala gw'otannaba kusisinkana, genda mu maaso n'okukola okusinga mwembi lwe mulisisinkana.
lg.Are you doing what you told yourself you: Okola ekyo kye weegamba kye wali ogenda okukola?
lg.Can you fight off the old you long enoug: Osobola okulwanisa obukadde bwo osobole okufuna ggwe omuggya?
lg.It's impossible to stay at the same leve: Kizibu okusigala ku ddaala lye limu singa ogenda mu maaso n'okugezaako
lg.Remember that trying is 80% of doing som: Jjukira nti okugezaako kuli ku bintundu kinaana ku buli kikumi (80%). Noolwekyo gezaako, era towanika kubanga okuwanika kuli ku bintundu ebirala abiri ku buli kikumi (20%).
lg.Try something new! If you win you'll be: Gezaako ekintu ekipya! Singa owangula ojja kubeera musanyufu ate singa olemererwa ojja kubeera mugezi.
lg.Not every door that's closed is locked,: Si buli luggi oluzzeewo nti luggale, lusindike lweggule.
lg.How you do one thing is how you do every: Engeri gy'okolamu ekintu ekimu gy'okolamu buli kintu
lg.Sometimes we are so focused on the futur: Ebiseera ebimu essira tuliteeka ku biseera by'omu maaso bye tutalaba ne tulemwa okulaba nti leero bye biseera by'omu maaso bye twasabirira edda okumala emyaka.
lg.The move that you're afraid to make coul: Ekintu ky'otya okukola kiyinza okubeera nga kye kigenda okukyusa obulamu bwo.
lg.Just keep showing up when most people qu: Genda bugenzi mu maaso abantu abasinga bwe balemererwa.
Buli lunaku oyingira olutabaalo olupya: Ggwe ku ggwe. Teweerabira nti bulijjo oli muwanguzi.
lg.Happiness comes from solving your proble: Essanyu liva mu kugonjoola bizibu sso si mu kubyewala.
lg.If you can't do the small things right n: Bw'oba tosobola kukola bintu bitono mu kaseera kano… osuubira okya okukola ebinene edda?
lg.Remember if you are stressing it’s becau: Jjukira nti bw'obeera ogezaako, kibeera nti obeera tonnawanika.
lg.Stop worrying you'll figure it out like: Lekera awo okweraliikirira, ojja kukikola nga bwe wakikolanga edda.
lg.Life is like a bicycle. To keep your bal: Obulamu bulinga ggaali. Olina okubeera nga weetengerera, olina okusigala ng'ogenda mu maaso.
Omukisa? Nedda osobola okukola omukisa gwo.
lg.Motivation is what gets you started habi: Obuvumu bwe bukuyamba okutandika olwo empisa ne zikuyamba okugenda mu maaso.
lg.Don't limit your challenges, challenge y: Tokoma ku bisoomoozo byo, ebisoomoozo bye bijja okkukomako.
lg.Don't be the one thing standing in your: Tobeera muziziko oguyimiridde mu kkubo lyo.
lg.Sometimes things don't go your way or as: Ebiseera ebimu ebintu tebitambula nga bw'obyagala oba nga bwe wabiteekateeka. Ebintu biyinza okukyuka, okusazibwamu, oba okukuzza emabega. Kola kyonna ky'osobola okuddamu okutandika, naye tandika.
lg.Strive for progress, not perfection: Fuba nnyo okugenda mu maaso, si obutabaako kamogo
lg.The most important skill in life is lear: Akakodyo akasinga obulungi mu bulamu kwe kuyiga okukola ebintu ng'owulira toyagala kubikola. Omuntu yenna asobola okukikola bwe kiba kyangu abantu abamu batendewalira mu kaseera ebintu bwe bizibuwalira.
lg.Every overnight success has been years i: Buli buwanguzi bw'ofuna mu kiro bubanga obutuukiddwako oluvannyuma lw'emyaka.
lg.Sometimes when you're in a dark place yo: Ebiseera ebimu bw'obeera mu kizikiza olowooza nti obeera oziikiddwa, naye ekituufu kiri nti obeera oziikiddwa.
lg.“Dream”, counsels the visionary; “toil”,: Ekirooto", kiyambako okulabira ewala; "okulafuubana", kuyambako abakola, naye olina okukola byombi.
lg.Even in the depths of despondence, a day: Ne bw'obeera nga tolina ssuubi yadde, olunaku lw'omala lukuwa essomo. Beerawo ozuule ebirala!
lg.Whatever Life gives you, even if it hurt: Kyonna obulamu kye bukuleetera, ne bwe kiba kikunyiga, beera bubeezi mugumu era obeere nga atalina kizibu. Ebisenge ebigumu binyeenya naye tebimenyeka.
lg.Life is a circle of happiness, sadness,: Obulamu nkulungo ya ssanyu, ennaku, n'ebiseera ebirungi. Bw'obeera ng'oyita mu kiseera ekizibu, beera n'okukkiriza nri ebiseera ebirungi bijja.
lg.Every struggle in your life has shaped y: Buli kulafuubana kw'oyiseemu mu bulamu kukuteeseteese okufuuka ekyo ky'oli leero, noolwekyo beera musiimu eri ebiseera ebizibu, byongera bwongezi kukugumya.
lg.Don’t give up, the beginning is always t: Toggwaamu maanyi, bulijjo entandikwa y'esinga obuzibu
lg.Good things come to those who believe, B: Ebirungi bijja eri abo abalina okukkiriza, ebirungiko bijja eri abagumiikiriza. Ebirungi ennyo bijja eri abo abatawanika.
lg.Your first thought in the morning should: Ekirowoozo kyo ekirina okusooka kumakya kirina kuba "weebale
lg.Those who have a ‘why’ to live, can bear: Abo abalina "lwaki" balamu, basobola okugumira kumpi na buli kintu kyonna "butya"- Viktor E. Frankl
lg.”The grass is greener where you water it: Omuddo gwongera okufuuka ogwa kiragala w'ogufukirira." Neil Barringham.
lg.Live to inspire, and one day people will: Baawo ng'ekyokulabirako eri abalala era olunaku lumu abantu bajja kugamba, olw'okuba ggwe, ssaawanika.
lg.Particular food items such as - tea, cof: Ebika by'emmere ebimu gamba nga; amajaani, kaawa, kyokuleeti, ssukaali, switi, eby'okunywa ebitatamiiza, omunnyo ogusukkiridde, n'ebirungo.
lg.Imbalance of substances (electrolytes) t: Obutenkanankana bw'ebintu mu mubiri (obusannyalaze) ebikuuma amazzi munda oba wabweru w'omubiri era nga bya mugaso ku binwa n'obusimu bw'omubiri.
Obulwadde oba ebbugumu eringi mu mubiri
lg.Hormonal changes/Menstruation: Enkyukakyuka mu busimu bw'omubiri/Okugenda mu nsonga
lg.Very warm weather, hot baths or showers,: Obudde obw'ebbugumu, okunaaba amazzi agookya, naddala nga waliwo enkyukakyuka ey'embagirawo mu bbugumu
Okunywa omwenge oba ebiragalalagala ebitakkirizibwa mu mateeka
lg.Watching TV and playing video games in a: Okulaba TV n'okuzannya obuzannyo bwa vidiyo mu bisenge ebitaliimu nnyo kitangaala era ne mu buwanvu obulungi obutakukosa okuva ku lutimbe (waakiri mmita bbiri n'ekitundu (2.5) okuva ku TV, n'ekitundu kya mmita (0.5) okuva ku ndabirwamu ya kompyuta.
lg.Limiting the time spent in front of the: Okukendeeza ku budde bw'omala ku TV, kompyuta, oba ku byuma ebikozesebwa mu ngalo  (essimusseereza/taabuleeti) oba okukendeeza by'ozannyira ku kompyuta n'emizannyo gya vidiyo.
lg.Using flicker-free monitors (LCD or flat: Okukozesa entimbe ezikendeeza ekitangaala mu liiso (LCD oba eby'olutimbe oluseeteevu)
lg.Reducing the brightness on screen monito: Okukendeeza ku kitangaala ekiva ku lutimbe lwa kompyuta.
lg.Using a remote control instead of walkin: Okukozesa limooti okukyusa omukutu mu kifo ky'okutambula ogende ku TV.
lg.Adjusting Internet settings to control m: Okukyusa enteekateeka y'omutimbagano okusobola okufuga ebifaananyi ebitambula.
lg.I love who I am and can not wait to see: Njagala ki kyendi era sisobola kulinda kulaba ki kye nfuuka
lg.An aura is unusual feeling, experience,: Embeera y'okuva mu bulamu bwo obwa bulijjo kwe kwewulira obubi, okuyita mu mbeera oba okutaataaganyisibwa mu butoffaali bw'omubiri ekiraga okujja kw'okwesika .
lg.What kind of aura was it: Embeera etali ya bulijjo yali ya ngeri ki
